name: quirk
structure: Produces entries for different types of genres and worlds. The 'common' and 'rare' tables are generic and should be compatible with almost any world. To retain compatibility with most settings, the  non-generic tables should be called only from other tables by specifying their name directly.
note: Developed from the quirk generation section of 'Goblin Names' generator by Ron Calbick.
authors: Ron Calbick (as extracted from his goblin-names.json generator), ELF Vesala.

tables.name: init
tables.explanation: Initializing the required global variables, if any.

tables.name: section
tables.explanation: Long description as a subheading and a text paragraph.

tables.name: exclusive
tables.explanation: Extra rare types (not produced by random).

tables.name: animalistic
entries: likes to eat just about anything, including dirt, leaves, wood, paper, and just about anything else that is even remotely edible
often marks territory as an animal would, urinating at various key locations, even indoors
has a tendency to bury things, from sticks and rocks to valuables, and rarely remembers where they were buried afterwards
eats using only hands, using no utensils

tables.name: appearance
entries: has few teeth and even those remaining are in a state of severe decay, but nonetheless frequently smiles proudly
appears to have once been severely burned, but still manages to function almost normally

tables.name: behavior
entries: is always trying to sneak and hide from others, as if life were one big game of hide and seek

tables.name: bestial
entries: has an unusually large nose that is particularly keen, often used for tracking by scent
prefers to eat their meat raw

tables.name: body language
entries: likes to stand with their hands behind their back

tables.name: clothing
entries: wears clothing adorned with all manner of worthless knick-knacks
is unusually clean and takes great pride in wearing various ridiculous outfits
wears an absurd headdress that looks like its about to slip off and fall to the ground
always wears their favorite piece of clothing
likes to dress formally even for everyday occasions
likes to always wear a hat
likes strong contrasts in their apparel
wears only light clothing, no matter what the weather is like

tables.name: communication
entries: is incapable of speaking softly and often blurts things out at the most inopportune times
speaks of themselves in the third person
speaks to others like to a child
demands that others say 'please' when asking for something

tables.name: fear
entries: does not like being higher than ground level

tables.name: humor
entries: laughs loudly at their own jokes
makes a lot of puns without even noticing

tables.name: hygiene
entries: smells especially noxious, often leaving a lingering odor behind
picks their nose and then inspects findings
picks their nose and eats the findings
digs deep into their ear with a bare finger
keeps a toothpick in their mouth

tables.name: knowledge
entries: has an unusual knowledge of uses for nearly any plant but tends to eat any of them that aren't harmful
does not want to admit to having been wrong
pretends to have knowledge in matters out of their expertise
is always aware of the current phase of the moon

tables.name: manners
entries: is prone to frequent loud, odorous belching that often makes others sick to their stomachs
is prone to nose-picking when deep in thought or anxious about something
drools incessantly and has a tendency to spit on others when speaking

tables.name: mood
entries: gets into a bad mood during bad weather
does a small victory dance after winning anything
likes to constantly complain about something

tables.name: movement
entries: is very bow-legged and moves about in a very awkward fashion as if actually mounted
can't stand still and is constantly bouncing from one foot to the other, pacing, or fidgeting
clumsily bumps into others and the environment
likes attempting to climb over obstacles

tables.name: nourishment
entries: is rarely seen not in possession of various foodstuffs
does not want to drink anything cold
asks others to share some of their food

tables.name: physical
entries: when speaking to others, moves up close and opens their eyes wide

tables.name: possession
entries: drags a very old, tattered, and barely recognizable scrap of blanket around everywhere
carries around a broken sword and longs to recover the other piece, after which it will be reforged and grant great power to its owner
is accompanied by a mongrel dog that looks fierce, growling and barking, but flees at the first sign of combat
always carries their favorite item with them
is unable to sleep without their favorite item
always carries coins to give away
constantly borrows small items and forgets to return them
always attempts to have better equipment than others

tables.name: primitive
entries: wears a trophy necklace of small rodent tails that looks ridiculous and smells horribly
has a great number of body piercings of decoratively carved pieces of bone
is usually coated with a thick, dried layer of mud

tables.name: retarded
entries: breaks into an absurd dance after any accomplishment, whether the task was important or not
jumps up and down wildly at anything humorous and has a laugh that sounds very much like a braying donkey

tables.name: senses
entries: is missing an ear, claiming it simply fell off and was never found
has an unusually large nose that is particularly keen
likes to closely examine their surroundings
is very suspectible to temperature changes

tables.name: social
entries: prefers small groups to large crowds
cannot stand any kind of animosity
is unable to act normally in the presence of someone they really like
corrects others word choices and pronunciation
blames others for their own mistakes
likes to boast how difficult it has been for them
measures how good friends their acquaintances are
constantly thinks of what their mother would think about the matter
uses a pet name about themselves
wants that everything is done their way
must always be entertained like a small child

tables.name: superstitious
entries: always throws a handful of small bones and reads them before making any important decisions
believes the moon grants special powers and loves sharing that notion with others
makes a warding gesture whenever they see a religious symbol

tables.name: compoundbegin
tables.explanation: Compound word beginnings for randomized terms.

tables.name: compoundend
tables.explanation: Compound word endings for randomized terms.

tables.name: ending
tables.explanation: Separate word endings for randomized terms.

tables.name: fantasy
tables.explanation: Descriptions for fantasy worlds (with no basis in myth).
entries: has a penchant for dragons, but can't pronounce the word properly, calling them 'dagorns' instead

tables.name: myth
tables.explanation: Descriptions for mythic worlds (once thought true).

tables.name: medieval
tables.explanation: Descriptions for medieval worlds (with no magic).

tables.name: synonym
tables.explanation: Variant expressions for generator subject matter.

tables.name: looks
tables.explanation: Variant expressions for looking like something.

tables.name: attribute
tables.explanation: Attribute prepended to the front of the result.

tables.name: feature
tables.explanation: Features appended to the end of the result.

tables.name: test
tables.explanation: Test routine for checking the generator functionality.
